Based on the user's preferences and genre suggestions, I would recommend "Taxi Driver" to them.
Taxi Driver is a classic crime thriller directed by Martin Scorsese. The movie follows taxi driver Travis Bickle (played by Robert De Niro) as he navigates through the dark underworld of New York City in 1970s. As Travis' life spirals out of control, he becomes increasingly obsessed with the idea of a perfect world, free from suffering and injustice, which he believes can only be achieved through revolution and social upheaval.
Taxi Driver is an incredibly influential and enduring classic film that has captured the hearts and imaginations of audiences around the world for decades and continues to do so today.
